title: Holiday Countdown
description: Countdown to Christmas, New Year, and other major holidays
pageDescription: Countdown to Christmas, New Year, and other major holidays
aboutDescription: Track the time until your favorite holidays with live countdowns. Perfect for planning celebrations, shopping, travel, and building excitement for upcoming special days.

sections.title: How It Works
content: The countdown automatically updates every second, showing you exactly how many days, hours, minutes, and seconds remain until each major holiday. Holidays are sorted chronologically, so the next upcoming holiday appears first. The progress bar shows how far through the year we've progressed toward each celebration.

sections.title: Featured Holidays
content: We track major holidays including Christmas, New Year's Day, Valentine's Day, Easter, Independence Day, Halloween, and Thanksgiving. Easter and Thanksgiving dates are calculated automatically based on their traditional scheduling rules. Easter uses the Computus algorithm, Thanksgiving is the fourth Thursday of November.

sections.title: Holiday Planning Tips
content: Use these countdowns to plan ahead!
For Christmas, most people start shopping 6-8 weeks before
For travel, book flights 3-4 months in advance for best prices
For party planning, send invitations 3-4 weeks ahead
The one-week alerts help you remember last-minute preparations

sections.title: Common Questions
content:
Q: Can I add my own holidays?
The preset list covers major celebrations, but you can create personal reminders by duplicating the date math in your calendar and pairing it with our countdown timestamps.

Q: Do time zones matter?
Countdowns use your current device time zone. If you travel, refresh the page to align the remaining time to your new location.

Q: What about moving holidays?
Holidays like Easter and Thanksgiving automatically recalculate each year using their traditional rules so you always see the correct date.

Q: Can I share the timer?
Use the share actions in the app to send a link or summary of the remaining time. Recipients will see updated values when they open it.

Q: How far ahead can I plan?
The list includes the upcoming cycle for each holiday and refreshes annually, so you can prepare months in advance without manual updates.
